bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Pathological Condition of the body being affected by depletion heat following a deeply-penetrating invasion by fire heat. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 186: 治一切冷氣伏火，太陽丹方 , “Recipe for a major yang elixir. Cures all types of cold qi and hidden fire ”.

② Therapeutic Approach of treating fire heat by means of pharmaceutical substances of a cold nature. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 , Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥：其證莖盛不衰，精出不止， 多發消渴癰疽。伏火解毒 , “With its condition being a persistent erection and continuous emission of essence, and frequent outbreak of melting with thirst and obstruction-illnesses and impediment - illnesses, [employ the approach] to dissolve poison by subduing fire ”. ③ Pharmaceutical-technological Procedure to prepare pharmaceutical substances. Refers to the approaches applied by alchemists to decrease the “fire poison” of mineral substances. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry dan sha 丹砂 quotes QXZ : 丹砂伏火，化為黃銀 , “If dan sha ’s fire is subdued it is transformed to yellow silver”.
